original: Forgive me, my love.

original: I've got nothing against you.

original: Everyone wants that.

original: I've got a meeting I've got to go to.

original: They can't drive a car.

original: We need to do that as soon as we can.

original: You're carrying this too far.

original: It's a wonderful opportunity.

original: I slept very well last night.

original: Did you do well on the test?

original: It's impossible to prove that it's possible.

original: Why don't you help us?

original: Do you know how much that car cost me?

original: His resignation as Prime Minister came as a surprise.

original: I think him a good teacher.

original: Daniel is still awake.

original: I'm not young anymore.

original: Tom took another bite.

original: Sami can confide in Layla.

original: I want you to return to your seat.

original: You are curious, aren't you?

original: Don't go by this dangerous path anymore.

original: I spent my vacation in Boston.

original: They invited them to dinner.

original: She doesn't understand me, either.

original: Someone screamed.

original: I took a taxi from the train station to the hotel.

original: I'd better get back home.

original: Which friends of yours are going to come?

original: He won't call this evening.

original: You can't blame me for that.

original: No one is answering.

original: Isn't life just great?

original: After about five drinks, Tom's behaviour becomes unpredictable.

original: You haven't got to prepare a formal speech.

original: A small black cat scuttled across the street.

original: Will you buy me some bread, please?

original: The airport was closed because of the fog.

original: She attacked him with her fists.

original: Tom can speak French almost as well as Mary.

original: I've always distrusted them.

original: I'm smarter than you.

original: This rope isn't strong enough.

original: I wanted you to have this.

original: We take our tea with sugar.

original: She has even more books.

original: Don't waste time on trifles.

original: I don't know what her name is.

original: I wonder if he loves me.

original: I'm not in the least afraid of snakes.

original: I haven't gotten used to it yet.

original: Perhaps Tom can win.

original: He is kind rather than gentle.

original: His content is not very good.

original: I wonder what could be in the box.

original: We have nothing to drink.

original: My birthday approaches.

original: There was a cat on the table.

original: Santa Ana was living in exile in Cuba.

original: There are forty people in the group.

original: I'm aware of that.

original: Tom whipped out his cellphone to take a picture.

original: Free it.

original: Let's go in my office.

original: John is at his peak now.
translated: John est à son apogée.

original: Are you the one who caused this mess?

original: Tom had no other choice but to help Mary clean out the garage.
translated: Tom n'eut pas d'autre choix que d'aider Mary à nettoyer le garage.

original: I'm pleased with his performance.

original: Free Catalonia!

original: Let's watch TV.

original: Oh, you're Palestinian!

original: I thought I could trust you.

original: Tom and Mary are sleeping.

original: I think you ought to postpone the meeting.

original: I treat everybody the same.

original: I'm sorry. I can't let you in.

original: Read the letter.

original: You're really a hard worker.

original: You mustn't miss seeing this wonderful film.

original: I like foreign languages.

original: Tom can't live without his mobile phone.

original: I'm sorry, but I can't find the book you lent me.

original: Can you eat the skin of a kiwifruit?

original: At what temperature do you cook your chicken?

original: I turned off the lamp and went to sleep.

original: The fridge was empty.

original: I'll fight to the death.

original: I feel faint.

original: You're not as young as Tom.

original: We can say you are lucky.

original: He described exactly what happened.

original: You need to be strong to do something like that.

original: May I have a look at your ticket?

original: I had to do this today.

original: It goes without saying that nothing is more important than health.

original: I may never be able to walk again.

original: This house is haunted.
translated: Cette maison est hantée.

original: They need washing.

original: He never saw him again.

original: I couldn't get that lucky.

original: I built this doghouse by myself.

original: He is too tired to study.

original: I have three times as many books as Tom.

original: This letter isn't addressed to you.

original: Do you know whose car this is?

original: I need a drink first.

original: He told me that you were right.

original: The bird is eating little insects.

original: The hour of afternoon rest has arrived.
translated: L'heure de la pause de l'après-midi était arrivée.

original: I used to have a dog.

original: Tobacco arrived.

original: Tom's harmless.

original: Do you want to go first?

original: If you're tired, rest.

original: Suffice to say, Edna gets no work done.

original: They helped us.

original: Are you telling me you're not involved?

original: Aren't you a psychologist?

original: He is good at football.

original: There is a little hope that he will succeed.

original: Maybe I need a lawyer.

original: He lived a happy life.

original: I like this rendition more than the original version.

original: Have you got any change?

original: I give my pledge that I will quit smoking.
translated: Je m'engage à arrêter de fumer.

original: I don't have a driving licence yet.

original: Paul bought them a gift.

original: It doesn't matter whether he agrees or not.

original: This was easy.

original: We did what we were told.

original: I was shocked about John's death.

original: She is sick.

original: We spent hours looking for it.

original: I'll see you around.

translated: Qu’il fasse beau, qu’il fasse laid, c’est mon habitude d’aller sur les cinq heures du soir me promener au Palais-Royal.

original: Respect your elders.

original: I got a shave and a haircut.

original: It is cool outside.

original: I'm sure we can work this out.

original: Have some enthusiasm for your job.

original: If somebody wants to bad-mouth you, you should just let them say whatever they want. It's a waste of time to get bothered by it.
translated: Si quelqu'un veut vous salir, on devrait le laisser dire. S'en soucier est une perte de temps.

original: They camped on the beach.
translated: Ils ont campé sur la plage.

original: We all cried a lot.
translated: Nous avons toutes beaucoup pleuré.

original: It was real hard work.
translated: C'était vraiment un travail difficile.

original: Can you watch him?
translated: Tu peux garder un œil sur lui ?

original: I love speaking Spanish.
translated: J'aime bien parler espagnol.

original: I, too, have a question.
translated: J'ai moi aussi une question.

original: She is very thoughtful and patient.
translated: Elle est vraiment attentive et patiente.

original: Which is your luggage?
translated: Laquelle est votre valise ?

original: Protect the environment!
translated: Protégez l'environnement !

original: Don't stick your nose where it doesn't belong.
translated: Ne fourre pas le nez dans un vase étranger.

original: She rubbed her eyes.
translated: Elle se frotta les yeux.

original: I liked it a lot!
translated: Je l'ai beaucoup apprécié !

original: How is that question germane to what we're discussing?
translated: En quoi cette question se rapporte-t-elle à ce dont nous discutons ?

original: He avoids keeping company with those ladies.
translated: Il évite de tenir compagnie à ces dames.

original: Something changed.
translated: Quelque chose a changé.

original: Dibs.
translated: Preum's.

original: When will you ever learn?
translated: Quand apprendrez-vous jamais ?

original: I didn't change a thing.
translated: Je n'ai rien changé.

original: We were excited as we watched the game.
translated: Nous étions excités en regardant le match.

original: The people can always be brought to the bidding of the leaders. That is easy. All you have to do is tell them they are being attacked and denounce the pacifists for lack of patriotism and exposing the country to danger. It works the same way in any country.
translated: Les gens peuvent toujours être soumis aux ordres des dirigeants. C'est facile. Il vous suffit de leur raconter qu'ils sont attaqués et de dénoncer les pacifistes parce qu'ils manquent de patriotisme et exposent leur pays au danger. Ça marche de la même manière dans tous les pays.

original: Stay with me.
translated: Restez avec moi.

original: He heaped up a fortune.
translated: Il a amassé une fortune.

original: ׁWe're measuring the depth of the river.
translated: Nous mesurons la profondeur de la rivière.

original: The voice acting is horrible.
translated: La synchronisation est horrible.

original: But human beings are different.
translated: Mais les hommes sont différents.

original: I want to know what it is.
translated: Je veux savoir de quoi il s'agit.

original: You have the advantage of a good education.
translated: Tu as l'avantage d'une bonne éducation.

original: I don't know how many minutes we've got.
translated: Je ne sais pas de combien de minutes nous disposons.

original: In spite of everything, I think it's not bad.
translated: Malgré tout, je pense que ce n'est pas mal.

original: Do you want to see my translations?
translated: Veux-tu voir mes traductions ?

original: The kid has a keen sense of hearing.
translated: L'enfant a une ouïe très développée.

original: The Devil made me do it.
translated: Le diable me l'a fait faire.

original: You need to study more.
translated: Vous avez besoin de plus étudier.

original: Pick your friends so that you can benefit from them.
translated: Choisis tes amis de sorte qu'ils te profitent.

original: You couldn't have picked a better spot.
translated: Vous n'auriez pas pu choisir de meilleur endroit.

original: You're an idiot to go out in this weather.
translated: Tu es un imbécile de sortir par un temps pareil.

original: Do you have children's clothes?
translated: Auriez-vous des vêtements pour enfants ?

original: My father is in his room.
translated: Mon père se trouve dans sa chambre.

original: She feeds her dog the same thing that she eats.
translated: Elle donne à manger à son chien la même chose qu'elle mange.

original: Discrimination on the basis of gender is prohibited.
translated: La discrimination sexuelle est interdite.

original: He worked long into the night.
translated: Il a travaillé jusque tard dans la nuit.

original: I wasn't involved.
translated: On ne m'a pas impliqué.

original: I can't let you in there.
translated: Je ne peux pas t'autoriser à entrer là.

original: I was in Boston last week with my wife.
translated: La semaine dernière, j'étais à Boston avec ma femme.

original: I'm not so normal.
translated: Je ne suis pas si normal.

original: Tom is boring, isn't he?
translated: Tom est ennuyeux, non ?

original: The women are working.
translated: Les femmes travaillent.

original: Why didn't you just leave?
translated: Pourquoi n'es-tu pas simplement partie ?

original: Promise me.
translated: Promets-le moi.

original: You drive a hard bargain.
translated: Vous êtes dur en affaires.

original: Did you want anything else?
translated: Vous fallait-il quelque chose d'autre ?

original: I wake up at eight.
translated: Je me réveille à huit heures.

original: Tom is walking around.
translated: Tom se promène.

original: She has gonorrhea.
translated: Elle a la gonorrhée.

original: He fell in love with his best friend.
translated: Il est tombé amoureux de sa meilleure amie.

original: I think I can fix this.
translated: Je pense que je peux arranger ça.

original: Have you recently had unexplained swelling of your arms or legs during periods of inactivity?
translated: As-tu subi récemment un gonflement inexpliqué de tes bras ou de tes jambes pendant des périodes d'inactivité ?

original: Tom flew.
translated: Tom était en avion.

original: Tom and Mary kissed each other for the first time on Christmas Eve.
translated: Tom et Marie se sont embrassés pour la première fois la veille de Noël.

original: Tom looks nice.
translated: Tom a l'air gentil.

original: Please tell me where the police station is.
translated: S'il vous plaît, dites-moi où est la station de police.

original: We're coming!
translated: On arrive.

original: Water is essential to life.
translated: L'eau est indispensable à la vie.

original: Why didn't you follow my advice?
translated: Pourquoi n'as-tu pas suivi mon conseil ?

original: I don't speak correctly.
translated: Je ne parle pas correctement.

original: Tom can trust Mary.
translated: Tom peut faire confiance à Mary.

original: What's that picture inside your locker?
translated: Quelle est cette photo à l'intérieur de ton casier ?

original: I wonder whether or not there really is a Santa Claus.
translated: Je me demande s'il y a vraiment un Père Noël.

original: How can they do that?
translated: Comment peuvent-ils faire cela ?

original: Yes, over there.
translated: Oui, par là.

original: If the sun went out, all life would die.
translated: Si le soleil s'éteignait, toute vie mourrait.

original: I have already drunk three beers. It's enough!
translated: J'ai déjà bu trois bières ; c'est assez !
